name: Mini-Games Madness Volume #1: Hello World!
overview: Pack of 4 mini-games! Eels and Ladders: A 2-player board game (also with a single player mode). Cave Run - The Lost Gems Edition: An endless run and jump game where your goal is to collect as many gems as possible before you perish. The game gets more difficult the longer you survive. Copter: A highly addictive arcade game. Mini-Farmer: Manage and grow your own organic farm.
